QuestData.Title: Catapult Destruction
QuestData.Description:
It sounds like the ogres plan on attackin' our friends back at the camp!
I saw them workin' on some catapults. Didn't know those oafs knew how tae use 'em.
Lucky for you, I packed something special, courtesy of that little fella Lindie.
Take these bombs. They'll make quick work of those catapults!
QuestData.LogDescription: Blow up $1oa catapults within Darkmaul Citadel.
QuestData.RewardText: Great work! I'll have tae tell Lindie that his bombs worked perfectly.
